column1: full on leg, he sweeps hard to short fine but can't beat the man
drifting down leg, he sweeps this easily past backward square! No one back behind square and he roped it behind square
fuller on middle, he drives to long on
full outside off, he reverse paddles off the edge just past the keeper
fuller outside off, he drives to mid off
short and wide, he cuts firmly to cover-point

Dropped by Dwarshuis running back at short fine! He tries to scoop first ball but got it too high on the bat and it goes really high over short fine, he backs back and gets hands to it but can't hang on
fuller on off, he drives and gets a thick inside edge to forward square
fuller and straighter, he tries to whip from middle, gets an inside edge onto the pad
drives in the air just straight of mid off! A better stroke, but in the air, mid off is wide. He drove it well enough to beat the man on the circle
whipped over square leg! Full and angled into leg and he picks this up off the pads and flicks it over square leg into the crowd
launched over square and into the upper deck! A length ball angled into leg and he hammers this way back over deep square. It hit the top of the grandstand!
103kph, full and wide but too wide
darted into leg, he defends on the front foot
lofted inside out over wide long off! Tossed up outside off, a step him, he stayed leg side and lofted it with ease into the crowd
shorter length on middle, he's back and cutting firmly to cover-point
darted into leg, he tries to sweep and is taken on the pad
drifting down leg, he glances this to short fine
full on off, he drills a lofted drive straight down the ground! This was flat and controlled, just a punch with the bottom hand and it bounces over the rope
back of a length, on middle, he's back and defending to the gap at point
length ball, on middle, he tries to paddle sweep but it comes off the pad and runs fine
short and wide, he hammers a cut to deep point

caught at backward point by Lyon! Good catch. Similar to the one Dwarshuis dropped. A length ball, he tried to launch across the line over long on, it sliced it high over backward point, Lyon had to run back from the circle, it swirled a lot but Lyon did well to get under it and hang on. It bobbled as he clutched it to his chest
short and wide, he's back and cutting to deep point
shorter length outside off, 134kph, he's back and defending off an inside edge onto pad
quicker and wider of off, he's back and dabbing this nicely fine of third man
flighted, he's back and working this to midwicket
shorter length wide of off, he's back and late cutting to short third man
length ball, straighter, he's back and working this to midwicket
pushed through on off, he's back and defending
an edge trying to force off the back foot against the turn, it runs fine for a couple
fractionally short and wide, he late cuts magnificently with the angle, threading it between short third man and backward point! Super shot
good length, he tries to late but again but mistimes it
back of a length, angled across, some extra bounce and he misses trying to late cut
short and wide, 132kph, he cuts hard to deep point
back of a length, outside off, he tries to pull but misses
good length top of middle, he's squared up, gets a leading edge that runs through a gap at point
slower ball, angled into leg, it takes him on the pad as it was going down leg
back of a length outside off, 140kph, he lays this off to third man with an angled bat
137kph, back of a length, outside off, he's beaten trying to run to third man
shorter on the hip, he pulls off the glove, it runs fine, O'Keefe runs a long way from wide fine leg to make a diving save
good length, he gets an bottom edge that drops down and McSweeney sneaks through
good length, top of off, he's back and defending
tossed up outside off, he slog sweeps powerfully over deep midwicket! Great strike with the three back
short and wide, he's back and cutting to deep point
full on leg, he sweeps hard to deep square
short and wide, he's back and cutting to deep point
tossed up, he jumps down but doesn't get to the pitch and is taken on the pad
angled into leg, he tries to reverse sweep but gets a bottom edge
full on off, 134kph, he drives to mid off
slower ball, full toss, he whips behind square for a couple
fuller outside off, he drives but mistimes it to mid off

Given LBW! This looked straight. He tried to work across the line and was hit on the knee roll. There was two noises but it may been the ball hitting both pads. He didn't look concerned walking off. Ball tracking had it smashing middle
134kph, back of a length and it seams and swings away, he's beaten trying flash on the up
132kph, good length, beaten outside off trying to run to third man
full and wide, he drives to deep point
drifting into middle, he drives back to the bowler
shorter length outside off, he punches off the back foot to deep point
slower drifting into off, he defends on the front foot
short and wide, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
81kph, good length, he cuts to backward point but can't find the gap
short and wide, he's back and cutting to backward point
short and wide, he gives room and beats backward point with a cut to get a couple
dropped by Silk running in from deep midwicket! He tried a slog sweep and miscued hitting it straight up, there was no midwicket so Silk had to run 30m in but couldn't hang on.
good length on leg, he's back and working to midwicket
dropped by Philippe! He tries to late cut, gets a thick edge and Philippe can't hang on, it popped up away from him but he couldn't catch the rebound
good length, he's back and defending
back of a length, 138kph, on off, he pushes to long on
back of a length on off, he knocks this to point
fuller, he drives straight at Finch and it hits him and bounces away
angled into the pad, it comes off pad but it's heading down leg
angled into the thigh pad, it runs off the thigh and bounds away to fine leg
yorker on middle, he digs this out behind square
good length, he drives on the up to deep point
short and wide, he's back and cutting to point
short and wide, he's back and cutting to deep point
length ball outside off, he swings hard, gets a thick inside edge that runs to fine leg
slower ball on off, he defends back to the bowler
full angled into leg, he glances this wide of short fine and they pick up a couple
Stumped! Beautifully bowled. It was just 73kph with drift and drop, he skipped down and tried to whip but was beaten in flight, it slid through the gate and Philippe completes a neat stumping
tossed up outside off, he reached out and paddles fine, they take on the throw and he's back, just. They check upstairs but he's OK
drifting into middle, he works this to midwicket
short and wide, he cuts hard backward of square wide of the sweeper
drifting into leg, he's back and working this forward of square
drifting in and sliding on he gets a little inside edge onto pad
thumped way back over midwicket! A drag down and he pulled powerfully into the stands to bring up 50
And again! A step hit and he launches it over long on into the crowd!
shorter outside off, he punches this to point
steps outside off trying to whip, gets an inside edge onto pad and it rolls away
shorter length, he's back and punching to deep point
short and wide, pushed through, he leaves thinking it's a wide. He moved across towards it
132kph, full on middle, he chips this inside out just over mid off and he clears the man by enough to get two
slower ball yorker, he backs away, tucks it around the corner
full on leg, he pushes this to long on slowly and they call for two immediately, good running
dropped at deep point! Dwarshuis again! This was easier. It was uppercut straight to him in the deep on the rope, it was flat and waist high and he spilled it
short and wide, he's back and cutting powerfully past backward point! Too much width
108kph, good length outside off, he cracks it to cover
a premeditated scoop over short fine! Predicted the low full toss and it was knee high and he scooped it fine with no man back. He rarely plays that
launched high over straight mid off! A slower ball but a half volley and it was a step hit in the slot, one stride out and he smashed it through the line over the rope
short and wide, he's back and hammering a cut hard through cover! Amazing power
full on middle, he backs away and drives hard straight to the sightscreen and Smith cuts it off
full on the pads, he clips this neatly forward of square to the gap
full down leg, he glances this fine for four! Huge over. Another poor ball and he just tickled it fine
short and wide, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
lofted powerfully over mid off! This was a half volley in the slot, he leaned back and launched it inside out over mid off who is up
full on off, he drives to mid off but can't beat the man
length on middle, he's back and bunting this to the circle at mid on and they take two
low full toss, he clips this wide of long on for two more
full and wide, he gives room and carves this through backward point and Dwarshuis can't cut it off!
drilled inside out wide of long off! What a shot! Full outside off, he punches this hard inside out and beats the man in the deep
yorker on middle, he just digs it out for a single
caught at deep midwicket! Short slower ball, he tried to pul it high over deep midwicket but didn't get all of it and picks out Silk who takes the easy catch
full on middle, he whips this to the gap at wide long on for two

there it is! Short, he's back and pulling this neatly behind square to the gap and he picks up two and celebrates a a great century. That's his 8th in T20s. Equal second all time with David Warner and Michael Klinger.
short outside off, he'd back and cutting to deep point
thumped high into the Members! A knee high full toss and he just sat back and clubbed it way back into the stands
128kph, bouncer, he swings hard but misses
fuller outside off, he's camped back and thumps this to the fielder at mid off on the circle
an appeal for caught behind! Given leg byes as they run. He tried to ramp fine and it came off the forearm and went to Philippe. They thought it was a catch but the Renegades pinch a leg bye
caught at long off! Half volley outside off, he sat back and tried to launch down the ground, he nearly got all of it, it was a two metres short, Curran right on the rope takes the catch
bouncer outside off, he misses, they pinch a bye as Philippe misses the underarm run out attempt
shorter length, darted in, 93kph, he's back and punching to long on
tossed up and Vince lofts him over mid on with ease! He knew there was no turn and he just got a step hit ball, and lofted it beautifully
lofted inside out over cover! Ridiculously good. He gave room, got the full ball and opened the chest to slice it high over the rope
drifting down leg, he sweeps straight to short fine
angled down leg, he glances off the thigh pad to short fine
very full, he pushes this slowly towards long on, they look for two but it's not on
very full outside off, he square drives this to backward point
full on off, 138kph, he drives to mid off and takes a single
133kph, back of a length, he's trying to force off the back foot and mistimes it to cover
back of a length on off, he defends with soft hands to point
fuller on off, he drives powerfully but straight to cover
angled into middle and leg, he's working this off the pads through midwicket
angling down leg, it hits the pad and rolls away
back of a length wide of off, he tries to cut but misses
an appeal for caught down leg and it's turned down and called wide! This came off the thigh guard, clearly. Strange decision
good length, he tries to drive, gets a thick inside through square leg
fuller length, 132kph, he square drives on the up through point, they run well
124kph, angled down leg, he glances this wide of short fine leg, the outfield is slow and it slows up, Webster does well in the chase and it was tight for three but he just got home
shorter into the hip, he turns this behind square to the sweeper
120kph, slower ball, he mistimes a drive to cover
121kph, slower ball bouncer, he tries to pull but misses
full outside off, he backs away and square drives but picks out backward point
slower ball, length, 116kph, he pulls behind square to the sweeper
length ball wide of off, he square drives on the up behind point for a couple
angled into leg stump, he clips this forward of square of the pads, they press for two and Vince was struggling at one stage but the throw was wide
slower ball, full, he lofts this straight back over the bowler! Didn't flush it but got enough of it
full and straight, he swings hard and gets a thick inside edge that runs to short fine
angled down leg, he flicks this up and over short fine! Too straight and he flicked it over the man in the circle
lofted over midwicket! Slower ball on leg, he picked it and lofted this through the line with a lofted on drive that just kept carrying and carrying and carrying over the fence
he charges at a bouncer that is called a wide! Christian is furious. It was a tough call. It was called for going down leg. It was tight
112kph, slower ball on leg, he clips this behind square
worked off the pads through midwicket to the gap
called wide after another appeal for caught behind down leg. Again it came off the thigh pad! Not sure what the umpire's are watching. In fact Paul Wilson has changed his decision. It's a dot

Vince run out at the non striker's after Sutherland dropped a return catch! That's so unlucky. Philippe pumped a drive flat back at Sutherland at incredible pace, it comes off his left wrist as he tries to catch it and bounces behind him onto the stumps. Vince just watched it all unfold a few paces down the crease and had to walk off
length ball down leg, he glances this fine
shorter length, 130kph, he's back and across and working it forward of square
129kph slower ball, he gets an inside edge onto thigh pad behind square
angled into leg, he gets an inside edge onto thigh guard for a single
tossed up on leg, he tries to turn the face and gets a leading edge
shorter length, he's back and whipping to deep midwicket
shorter length, he's back and punching to cover who misfields and they get a couple
short and wide, he's back and slapping this to deep cover for two
short ball and he's back in a flash and thumping this high over midwicket! Too short and he punished it
pushed through on middle, he's back and defending
leg break on off, he drives to long off
dropped at cover by Christian! Tough chance. He skips down and drives flat inside out, Christian dives to his right but can't hang on
he skips down and chips this over the bowler neatly for two
slower leg break, he drives back to the bowler
shorter length, he's back and cutting hard to deep cover

dropped on the rope by McSweeney at deep square! Another tough chance! He charged and didn't get to the pitch, he dragged it high to forward square, McSweeney ran a long way from deep midwicket to his right and dives to get two hands to it but spills it
tossed up outside off, he drives firmly to long off
pushed through on off, he's back and punching to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and pulling but miscues to long on and it doesn't carry
drifting into leg, he drives off the thick inside edge to midwicket
shorter length, he's back and punching hard to deep cover
he advances and stays leg side but picks out cover with the drive
drifting down leg, he steps inside the line and sweeps hard past short fine!
slog sweep over long on! 50 for Philippe! Incredible strike. A step hit outside off, tossed up in the arc, he was down on one knee and launching over long on
short and wide, he's back and missing a cut
Inside out over cover! What a shot! He skipped down the track and lofted the leg break inside ou over cover wide of long off. It landed just inside the rope. Nearly went for six. Inches in it
short and wide, he hammers a cut shot straight to point
quicker and straighter, he's back and forcing this down the ground
pushed through, it skids on and takes him on the pad but was sliding down leg
88kph fuller, he yorks himself
darted into leg, he is cramped driving to cover
darted into leg, he steps inside the line and paddle sweeps up and over short fine! Great skill to counter the tight line
tossed up on off, he gives room and mistimes to cover
tossed up on middle, he lofts a check drive straight down the ground with amazing timing! Beats the sweepers
caught at deep midwicket! Angled into leg, he tried to flick this with the bottom hand over the rope but didn't time it well enough, Nabi is there, 5 metres from the rope to take the catch
angled into middle, he stays back to push to wide mid on
128kph, fuller on middle, he chips a drive back towards the bowler but it's just wide of his outstretched right hand
full outside off, he drives and gets a thick outside edge along the ground to backward point
back of a length outside off, he's back and guiding this to third man
full and angled into off, he's whipping this through midwicket to the sweeper
holes out to deep midwicket! Tossed up in the arc, he tried to launch over deep midwicket first ball but doesn't get enough of it and Webster takes the catch just in from the rope
short and wide, he cuts hard to deep point
drifting down leg, Stepien can't glove it and they get an extra
darted into leg, he clips this to deep forward square
drifting into leg, it takes him on the pad
shorter length, he's back and cutting to point
shorter length, he's back and punching to long on
he advances and drives magnificently inside out over cover! Superb shot set up by incredible footwork
full on leg, he sweeps hard behind square to the sweeper
pushed through outside off, he pushes this through cover
full on middle, he drives to wide long on, they push for two and get it
shorter on leg, he's back and working this through square
shorter length, he's back and giving room to cut past point for a couple
drifting into leg, he's back and glancing this with the angle to short fine
fractionally short, he gives room and opens up to hammer this past cover, Finch is close and is beaten, McSweeney has to be quick on the rope and he does well to save one
drifting into leg, he's cramped and forced to defend
shorter length, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
a reverse sweep over point! He set up early, didn't change his hands but he switched his feet and slapped it high over point and it nearly went for six!
shorter on leg, he's back and working it behind square

What a save from McSweeney to save four runs! This was launched high over over long on, McSweeney was backing back on the rope, jumped up with the one hand falling back and caught it and flicked it back in in the one motion
short outside off, he uppercuts over short third man!
An edge past the keeper trying to cut fine again! Genuine edge. He was trying to cut past short third man again
short outside off, he's back and across and working through midwicket
short on the hip, he's pulling behind square
length outside off, he guides this to short third man for a tight single
he skips down and tries to loft down the ground but miscues dragging it wide of long on for two
attempted reverse sweep, he's hit on the pad but outside the line
reverse sweep over point! What a shot to bring up 50 off 32 balls. His first in the BBL for six years. He smashed that one flat over point
quicker ball on leg, he knocks this with a nicely weighted push to the circle at midwicket and they pinch two
tossed up slower on leg, he sweeps off the bottom edge onto pad and it rolls away. He wanted one and yells at Hughes who sent him back
full on leg, he dances out and whips this to deep midwicket
Short ball, pulled powerfully over deep square! What a strike. He jumped all over that length.
shorter length, he cuts to backward point and they take a tight one
139kph, bouncer, he pulls but gets a top edge that flies high and safe to fine leg
138kph, bouncer, quicker and higher and beaten for pace
136kph, chest high, he hammers a pull shot forward of square! Powerful strike. He had burned his two above shoulder high for the over and Hughes could hit this length a lot easier
fuller length, he pushes this wide of long on and they pinch two
short and wide, he slaps a cut past backward point! Too much width and he finds the gap
full outside off, he pushes this back to the bowler
130kph, full outside off, he slices this to backward point
short slower ball, called wide, it was too high
short on the hip, he pulls this behind square and they get two for the winning runs
